001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.allure.AllureDbClientManager;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.allure.QueryResponseValidatorAllureImpl;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClientManager;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.validator.QueryResponseValidator;
007import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
008import org.springframework.context.annotation.ComponentScan;
009import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
010import org.springframework.context.annotation.Primary;
011
012/**
013 * Configures the database test framework components.
014 *
015 * <p>This class provides Spring configuration for database-related test components.
016 * It ensures that the framework automatically registers the necessary database
017 * client manager and query response validator implementations.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021@Configuration
022@ComponentScan(basePackages = {"io.cyborgcode.roa.db"})
023public class DbTestFrameworkAutoConfiguration {
024
025   /**
026    * Provides the primary database client manager implementation.
027    *
028    * <p>Uses {@link AllureDbClientManager} to enable database client interactions
029    * with enhanced logging and reporting for Allure.
030    *
031    * @param allureDbClientManager The Allure-enabled database client manager.
032    * @return The configured {@code DbClientManager} bean.
033    */
034   @Bean
035   @Primary
036   public DbClientManager dbClientManager(AllureDbClientManager allureDbClientManager) {
037      return allureDbClientManager;
038   }
039
040   /**
041    * Provides the primary query response validator implementation.
042    *
043    * <p>Uses {@link QueryResponseValidatorAllureImpl} to enhance query validation
044    * with Allure reporting capabilities.
045    *
046    * @param queryResponseValidator The Allure-enabled query response validator.
047    * @return The configured {@code QueryResponseValidator} bean.
048    */
049   @Bean
050   @Primary
051   public QueryResponseValidator queryResponseValidator(QueryResponseValidatorAllureImpl queryResponseValidator) {
052      return queryResponseValidator;
053   }
054
055}
